title: Why won't my phone stay on?
content:
The phone keeps shutting down. I'll hold the power button on to turn it on and it will shut off the moment I lift my finger off my power button, or after 30ish second it will just shut off itself 

I have followed all troubleshoot and help support supplied and the phone still won't stay on. 

This issue is very common with other pixel 4 users too. A common occurrence between the phones that happened with mine too is that the phone would display a constant 50% battery all day.
